reviewText: Pretty good movie. Check it out. Blu-ray is a bit grainy in some scenes.

This is one of my all time favorites and I am thrilled to finally own it. A special coming-of-age story. Her adjustments to college life after being a big fish in a high school pond are heartbreaking. I had forgotten about the Springsteen music which just caps it all with atmosphere and authenticity.
Always loved this early John Sayles gem. So glad to have it on Blu Ray.

This is a great film from a great director - John Sayles. Jill is the smart, popular Jewish girl at her school and Sheik is the bad boy with a weird anachronistic streak in his worship of Frank Sinatra (in the mid-60's). It's got a raw, gritty feeling that you don't get from the usual 80's teen romances. It's got a realistic plot and avoids all the cliche's. I love this movie.
One of my all-time favorite 80's movies. Vincent Spano just kills it in this movie. Excited to get it on Blu Ray!!
